title: Herbal Hangover Aid (Ajwain + Lemon Powder)
excerpt: Single-serve digestive powder with ajwain, lemon, rock salt and ginger to support rehydration and settle the stomach after overindulgence.
content:
## What Is This Hangover Aid?
A quick-mix single-serve powder combining ajwain (carom seeds), lemon powder, rock salt, and ginger to soothe the stomach, stimulate digestion, and support rehydration after overindulgence.

## Ayurvedic Significance
Ajwain stimulates agni (digestive fire) and relieves bloating; ginger warms and eases nausea; citrus restores lightness and electrolytes (with rock salt).

### Key Benefits
- Settles nausea and bloating.
- Supports rehydration and light digestion.
- Travel-friendly single-serve sachets.

## Ingredients
- Ajwain powder
- Lemon powder
- Rock salt
- Ginger powder

## Usage Instructions
- Mix one sachet in 200–300 ml of warm water, stir, and sip slowly until symptoms ease.

## Packaging
- Individually sealed single-serve sachets in a box.

## Safety & Consultation
- Avoid if you have severe vomiting, dehydration, or suspected alcohol poisoning—seek medical care. Consult doctor if on sodium-restricted diets.

## Why Choose This Powder?
A quick, traditional, and gentle approach to digestive relief after overeating or alcohol.
